oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.flex.runtime
Class FlexfieldResourceBundle

java.lang.Object
  oracle.javatools.resourcebundle.ResourceBundleWrapperRT
      oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.messages.FndMessagesResourceBundle
          oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.flex.runtime.FlexfieldResourceBundle
All Implemented Interfaces:
oracle.javatools.resourcebundle.ResourceBundleWrapper, oracle.javatools.resourcebundle.SearchSupport
public class FlexfieldResourceBundle
extends FndMessagesResourceBundle

ApplCore Internal Use Only. A resource bundle wrapper that provides flexfield runtime related messages.

getAdfExpression

public static java.lang.String getAdfExpression(java.lang.String resId)
Gets the ADF expression for accessing a resource entry.

An example of the return expression: ${adfBundle['oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.flex.runtime.FlexfieldResourceBundle']['FND:::FND_FFRES_oracle.apps.x.view.bundle.MyVOMsg#L10']}

Parameters:
resId - the resource ID
Returns:
the expression; null if the given resource ID is null
